00028         SketchElement *PathParser::parse(SketchElement *parent,
00029                 TiXmlElement *element)
00030         {
00031             Path *path = new Path(parent);
00032             parseAttributes(path, element);
00033 
00034             string data =
00035                     element->Attribute("d") ? element->Attribute("d") : "";
00036 
00037             PathDataParser *pathDataParser = new PathDataParser(path, data);
00038             pathDataParser->parse();
00039             delete pathDataParser;
00040 
00041             return path;
00042         }
00043     }
